page.title: 08Chillerton Village
page.content: The settlement at{Chillerton}ribbons the road running north to Newport down the valley where once the open brook ran. There is still a ford leading to cottages by{Sheat Manor.}This fine stone-built E-shaped Elizabethan house dates from 1605. About 60 people live in old cottages or new bungalows built high on the banks by the road. The Methodist Chapel is near the Post Office Stores. The red brick Victorian gabled school was built in l883. { {Chillerton Beauty }Many years ago a passing Botanist took a cutting from a fuchsia in the garden of an empty cot- tage at the top of Hill Lane. It is now in the National Fuchsia Catologue as Chillerton Beauty. The Parish Coun- cil would like to protect the original bush by a Protection Order.
